TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mauritania, title = Mauritania, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mauritania} }

S.FORM: Mauritania hya' ga cyux maki' tay 20 00 N, 12 00 W na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,030,700 sq km (maki' tay 29ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,030,700 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 3,677,293. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 38.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 0.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 61.30%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Nouakchott. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay mawpuw qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, aring ryax 5 squ byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2009 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Maoritania hya' ga cyox maki' tay 20 00 N, 12 00 W na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,030,700 sq km (maki' tay 29ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,030,700 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 3,677,293. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 38.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 0.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 61.30%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Nooakchott. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay mawpow qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Mohamed Oold Abdel Aziz, aring ryax 5 sqo byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2009 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
